summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Market Street, from 8th Avenue Northwest to 11th Avenue Northwest, all in the City of Seattle, by the construction of sewers therein together with all necessary appurtenances for the proper sewerage and drainage of said district, all in accordance with Resolution No. 4648, of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
